Expediency

EqMD programs guarantee that your patients obtain their medications and test results at the point of care. The whole process can be performed with your existing staff in less than 30 seconds per patient.

Equity Medical Solutions

Logical Choice For Your In-Office Medication Dispensing Program

Equity Medical Solutions (EqMD) is a nation-wide provider of technology-enabled dispensing solutions for physicians serving workers' compensation patients and patients covered by personal injury protection insurance and commercial PPO insurance. Applying ground-breaking technology, EqMD allows physicians and approved office staff to provide patients with medications quickly and safely at the point-of-care.

Your Patients Will Appreciate The Convenience

According to recent national study: "Three out of four Americans would have their prescription filled in their doctor's office instead of a pharmacy if given the choice, a new study finds, suggesting physicians are missing an opportunity to improve patient satisfaction and enhance revenue by not dispensing medicine in their office."

For Clients

American Medical Association (AMA) guidelines do not preclude office dispensing as long as state and federal regulatory requirements are fulfilled, the doctor prescribes only to his/her patients and allows them to fill prescriptions where they want.

The AMA Code of Medical Ethics acknowledges that physicians may dispense drugs in their office practices only if such dispensing primarily benefits the patient. Physicians must respect the patient’s freedom to choose where to fill prescriptions. EQMD does not have or exercise any control or direction over physician’s exercise of professional judgment. Information contained herein shall not be construed as medical, legal or other professional advice or opinion.  EQMD does not make any representation or warranty or incur any obligation hereunder. EQMD reserves the right to modify, add or discontinue any of its program services at any time and without notice.
